plot: XIXth century. Ferdinand II is the wise King of the Kingdom of Two Sicilies. His adviser is in love with a young woman whose father died in exile. She no longer believes in the monarchy. ...
title: Tempesta sul golfo

cast.role: Ferdinando II, re delle Due Sicilie
